pages.text: If Seasons is enabled, Cows take 5 season months to mature.

Chickens require $(li)Water $(li)Food $(li)Straw(optional) $(br2)Egg production is increased with straw. $(br2)If chickens are missing water and food, they will eventually die. $(br2)Feed: $(li)Wheat $(li)Barley $(br2)At max production, chickens drop 1 Egg per minecraft day.
